queue_intent: Stage 2 queue built from Stage 1 IR and repo truth at HEAD aba3944d25a14e2655a0f44aa2fc9b9239630f3c

tasks.title: GATE.S3_6.RUMOR_INTEL_MIN.002: Rumor lead generation and persistence core v0: extend IntelSystem to grant RumorLead entries on explore%hub-analysis actions; GalaxyGenerator seeds >= 1 lead for Seed 42 (min count tweak-routed via NEW: SimCore/Tweaks/IntelTweaksV0.cs); SerializationSystem%WorldLoader round-trip preserves lead list; SaveLoadWorldHashTests extended with lead digest regression (LeadId Ordinal asc, fields Ordinal asc, byte-stable pre/post save); divergence prints first differing LeadId%Field%Before%After deterministically
